full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement
## Solicitation Number: W8482-231287/A

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of fire fighting equipment and related accessories. The solicitation is open to all qualified bidders, both domestic and international.

### Solicitation Details:

* **Solicitation Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** The Crown intends to conduct this procurement under the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Items Required:

* **Item 1:**
	+ GSIN: 4210
	+ NSN: 00-4651906
	+ NOZZLE, FIRE EQUIPMENT
	+ Part No.: SFLTY1SZ11-2IN, NCAGE: 20266, ELKHART BRASS MANUFACTURING COMPANY, LLC
	+ Quantity: 97, Unit of Issue: EA, for delivery to C.F.B Halifax (NS)
* **Item 2:**
	+ GSIN: 4210
	+ NSN: 00-4651906
	+ NOZZLE, FIRE EQUIPMENT
	+ Part No.: SFLTY1SZ11-2IN, NCAGE: 20266, ELKHART BRASS MANUFACTURING COMPANY, LLC
	+ Quantity: 134, Unit of Issue: EA, for delivery to C.F.B Esquimalt (BC)
* **Item 3:**
	+ GSIN: 4210
	+ NSN: 01-4289763
	+ HEAD,SPRINKLER,FIRE PROTECTION
	+ Part No.: 72535, NCAGE: 03670, TYCO FIRE PRODUCTS LPOR
	+ Part No.: 30023739, NCAGE: KCN58, BAE SYSTEMS SURFACE SHIPS LIMITED
	+ Quantity: 120, Unit of Issue: EA, for delivery to C.F.B Halifax (NS)
